Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

XMIDI Next-Break Loop Controller (117)

Discussion

< 64: (Break) Loop iteration stops, regardless of the current For loop count

>= 64: (Next) Decrement innermost For loop count and, if nonzero, branch immediately to the innermost For controller event

One application of the Indirect Controller Prefix controller (q.v.) would be to turn a Next controller into a Break controller by providing a dynamic controller value as specified above. This feature may be used to introduce elements of application program control into sound-effect sequences. Otherwise, the Next controller should have a value greater than or equal to 64, in order to function in the manner detailed in the preceding For Loop Controller description.

Next Topic (XMIDI Clear Beat-Bar Count (118))

Previous Topic (XMIDI For Loop Controller (116))
